dwelling.name: Centaur Stables
dwelling.description: Gives centaurs to a visiting hero for free once per week

dwelling.name: Dwarf Cottage
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit dwarves. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Homestead
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit wood elves. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Enchanted Spring
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit pegasi. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Dendroid Arches
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit dendroid guards. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several dendroid guards

dwelling.name: Unicorn Glade
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit unicorns. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several unicorns

dwelling.name: Dragon Cliffs
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit green dragons. Replenishes every week. Guarded by a few green dragons
